params._usdc: USDC token address (use Base mainnet address in production)

params.gameId: Unique identifier for the game (can be Supabase UUID)

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit (in USDC decimals - 6)

params.ethAmounts: Array of ETH amounts to send to each player
params.gameId: The game to distribute payouts for
params.usdcAmounts: Array of USDC amounts to send to each player
